title: Virtual YouTuber Kizuna AI Official Comic Anthology
description:
The long-awaited comic anthology of the very popular virtual YouTuber, with more than 1.8 million subscribers, "Kizuna AI", has appeared!!

Youtube Channel: [url]https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC4YaOt1yT-ZeyB0OmxHgolA[/url]
